snippet.title: Caveman Stories - Trailer Steam (Oficial)  [Português]
snippet.description:
●  Página do Jogo no Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/814590/Caveman_Stories/

●  Lançamento: 10 de Abril de 2018

Em Caveman Stories, você controla um homem das cavernas que, no início de uma era glacial, se perdeu de sua tribo e agora deve lutar para sobreviver e encontrar um caminho de volta para casa. Você não vai querer perder essa aventura!

························································
►► QUER APRENDER A CRIAR JOGOS?
························································
Confira os cursos GRATUITOS aqui do canal:

● Criando um Jogo Completo no Blender (para iniciantes):
https://goo.gl/z3Tuat

● Criando um Infinity Runner no Blender (Nível: iniciante & intermediário):
https://goo.gl/hLXQxz

● Descubra o que está deixando seu jogo lento - Curso sobre Profiling na Blender Game Engine (BGE e UPBGE):
https://goo.gl/BpDDLf

● Aprenda a Programar em PYTHON para a BGE e UPBGE (Nível: Avançado):
https://goo.gl/XGq2Zu

● Dicas diversas sobre o Game Dev no Blender:
https://goo.gl/BH1Dey

························································
►► AINDA NÃO É INSCRITO NO CANAL? 
························································

● Se inscreva: 
https://goo.gl/6LoDpA

● Compartilhe o canal com seus Amigos: 
https://www.youtube.com/unidaystudio

● Acompanhe a Uniday Studio pelo FACEBOOK:
https://www.facebook.com/unidaystudio

························································
► Uniday Studio  -  2018
························································
►By: Guilherme Teres Nunes
